participant_1.background:
I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal.
I took my family camping and let my dogs run around.
i am a soccer player.
i love cabins in the woods on the lake.
I moved to the mountains so my dogs could have more space to run and play.

participant_2.background:
I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with.
I am a tour guide at the Grand Canyon.
i don t like music.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a tour guide at the Grand Canyon, and I love my job! How about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks! I'm a soccer player, and I love playing soccer! I also love to grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal.

That sounds delicious! I'm not much of a cook, but I do love to eat! I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with.
That's great! I love Christmas too! I have a family cabin in the woods on the lake, and we go camping there every year. It's a lot of fun!
That sounds like so much fun! I would love to go camping sometime. I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs, and it was an amazing experience!
That sounds amazing! I love hiking, and I've always wanted to find a hidden cave.
It was so much fun! I've also kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove.
That's interesting! I've never kept a secret from my parents, but I can understand why you would do that.
It's definitely been a challenge, but it's worth it to keep them happy.
I'm sure it is! It sounds like you have a lot of interesting experiences!
I do! I'm always looking for new adventures.
Me too! I love trying new things.
That's great! I'm glad we have something in common.
